  • Reference

Create residual table

Source: R/residuals.R
residuals.Rd

Theses functions are created to make the calculating and displaying of residuals easy and quick. It will get the raw, standard and studentized residuals from the lm object.

Usage

residuals_list(lm = NULL)

# S3 method for residuals.data
plot(x, ...)

# S3 method for residuals.data
print(x, ...)

Arguments

lm

A linear model object created by the lm() function

x

A residuals.data list object

...

ignored by this method

Value

A residuals

Plot function will return the plot object

A plain data.frame

Examples

mtcars.mod <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars)
residuals <- residuals_list(mtcars.mod)
plot(residuals)

print(residuals)
